title: BRIEF-Silchester International Investors Buys Stake In Tiger Brands
text:
BRIEF-Silchester International Investors Buys Stake In Tiger Brands

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 06, 2019 13:10)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Silchester International Investors Buys Stake In Tiger Brands Sept 6 (Reuters) - Tiger Brands Ltd : * JSE: TBS - ACQUISITION OF SECURITIES BY SILCHESTER INTERNATIONAL INVESTORS LLP * TIGER BRANDS LTD - ORDINARY SHARES OF COMPANY HELD BY SILCHESTER NOW AMOUNTS TO 5.10% OF TOTAL ISSUED ORDINARY SHARES OF COMPANY

BRIEF-Silchester International Investors Buys Stake In Tiger Brands
